data.detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Heroes & Generals is a full on, all-out WAR experience. The ultimate, large-scale multiplayer war. Thousands of players fighting one massive war of nations. The first to take 12 cities takes the glory.

Battle it out alongside newfound brothers from all over the world in multiple battles waging persistently as Generals strategize and deploy resources to assist their men.

As a soldier everything you do influences the war. Every kill you make, every tank you destroy, every town you capture matters. Even glorious defeat, because sometimes to win the war, many must die.

CHOOSE HOW YOU FIGHT

How you fight and the speed of progression is up to you.

Experience the rush of close quarter combat, the pleasure of picking off the enemy at range, the power of unleashing hell from a tank or wreaking havoc from an aircraft. The choice is yours.

MASTER YOUR OWN ARSENAL

You own and master your own equipment.

Unleash the terror of the badass Panther Tank, the power of the Yak-9B fighter 20mm cannons, or the stealth of a M8 Greyhound. Load out with the deadly PPS-43, the legendary Tommy Gun or the rare but lethal FG-42.

There are 65+ weapons and 70+ vehicles and aircrafts available and if that is not enough, use your wrench to humiliate the enemy!


KEY FEATURES

* Engage in combat as Infantry, Recon, Tank Crew, Paratrooper or Fighter Pilot.

* Fight in small, close-quarters Infantry encounters, in larger skirmishes with vehicles or in huge land and aerial assaults. All battles are connected in one giant persistent war.

* Gain experience as a soldier and earn credits towards better gear.

* Unlock more than 65 weapons and 70 vehicles and planes.

* Unlock upgrades and ammo for your weapons and vehicles.

* Unlock and equip Combat Badges enhancing your soldiers abilities. More than 35 different Combat Badges available.

* Enter combat as part of a squad with your friends.

* Join a nation and fight for the United States, Germany, or the Soviet Union

* Become a General, strategize and deploy resources to assist your men in battle.

data.short_description: Shoot, blow s**t up, fly or bark orders in the ultimate Free-to-Play, large scale, multiplayer WAR experience. Thousands of players in multiple battles fighting one massive war of nations. The first to take 12 cities takes the glory. Jump right in!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 series or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU w. SSE3 instruction set- dual-core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI HD 4810/NVIDIA 9600 GT or above (with >512mb RAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
